description: Configuration schema for Sanoid.net's monitoring capabilities

$id.description: The name of the config file. Sanoid expects to see 'Sanoid.monitoring.json'.

$comments.description: Comments about this document. Not used in configuration validation.

Health.description: This option is designed to be run by a Nagios monitoring system. It reports on the health of the zpool your filesystems are on. It only monitors filesystems that are configured in sanoid.net. Corresponds to the --monitor-health command line argument.

Capacity.description: This option is designed to be run by a Nagios monitoring system. It reports on the capacity of the zpool your filesystems are on. It only monitors pools that are configured in sanoid.net. Corresponds to the --monitor-capacity command line argument.

Snapshots.description: This option is designed to be run by a Nagios monitoring system. It reports on the health of your snapshots. Corresponds to the --monitor-snapshots command line argument.
